title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Growing and Managing an Entrepreneurial Firm (EP 60024) Involving creation of new business ventures, Nature of the financial institutionâs need for primary reserves and loan-able funds, Management of growth of the Firm with respect to contexts of Human resources, early stage/growth stage/exit stage capital, IPR strategy, diversification strategy and sustainable strategic management.
